channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Tangerine has already won Black Friday for me with an extra juicy 12-month intro offer
item.description: Internet service provider Tangerine Telecom has jumped the gun and dropped its Black Friday NBN deals early – they could just be the best I've ever seen.

item.title: NVIDIA, Qualcomm join U.S., Indian VCs to help build India’s next deep tech startups
item.description: Qualcomm Ventures has joined six Indian venture firms, collectively adding more than $850 million to boost India’s deep-tech ecosystem.

item.title: New York voted for a new citywide digital map. Here’s what it will do
item.description: A map that literally rules the streets of New York. There are many, many maps of New York City. There are the decor maps, sold on Amazon, and the tourist maps, which focus, erroneously, only on Manhattan. There’s the iconic subway map, as well as the MTA’s new version. There are the Eater and Grubhub maps, which tell us where to eat.

item.title: HP Black Friday 2025 laptop sales in Australia: early deals are already live, score up to 53% off
item.description: HP's early Black Friday deals are live with up to 51% off, so you can save as much as AU$1,599 weeks before the big day itself.
